title: macOS Monterey 12.3 has broken support for game controllers for some players
content:
Looking to play games on your newly updated Mac? You might have to skip bringing your game controllers. 

Shortly after its ‘Peek Performance’ event, Apple released macOS Monterey version 12.3. After updating, many users across Apple’s Developer Forums and Reddit are complaining that the update can’t support their game controllers. 

more…

The post macOS Monterey 12.3 has broken support for game controllers for some players appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Many gamers find they cannot use their Bluetooth controller to game on their Mac after updating to macOS Monterey 12.3 last week.
